text:
@narendramodi Respected Prime Minister Ji, 
As Coronavirus pandemic grips India, the  KAUSHALYA Foundation has decided to initiate some proactive measures for the migrant labourers, daily wagers and their families who are struggling to meet their daily needs. https://t.co/hMaQrmPEMF
